mapper.select: SELECT *, CONCAT(t.PN_MDL_NM," ", t.PN_STOR, "GB") as label FROM TBL011 t where t.PN_CARR LIKE CONCAT('%' #{mntCarr}, '%') AND t.PN_MKR = #{pnMkr} group by t.PN_MDL_NO, t.PN_STOR order by t.REL_DT desc, t.PN_MDL_NO, convert(t.PN_STOR, decimal), convert(t.PN_MSRP, decimal) desc
SELECT PN_MNT_RT_NO, PN_MNT_RT_NM, PN_CARR, PN_NET_TYPE, PN_MNT_AMT FROM TBL010 where PN_CARR = #{mntCarr} and PN_NET_TYPE = #{pnNetType} order by convert(PN_MNT_AMT, decimal) DESC
